location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Captain George Herne, Senior Officer at Katiff [Al-Qaṭīf]

mods.abstract: Riach asks for accurate information about the movements of Rahma [Raḥmah bin Jābir] at Katiff [Al-Qaṭīf], particularly if he had committed any acts of aggression toward boats from Katiff or elsewhere in the area. Riach asks in a postscript for information on the circumstances in which a boat of Rahma's was said to have been seized by the Bahrein [Bahrain] people, and a man of his killed.
